description: Added critical rule: all issues MUST include projectId from config

fixes.description: Added 'CRITICAL: Always Use Configured Project' section at top of docflow-core/RULE.md. All create_issue calls must include teamId and projectId from .docflow/config.json.

upgrade_notes: All issues now explicitly require projectId
Warning added: issues without projectId break tracking
